title: For Sale: Solly Hofman PSA 8(OC) Old Mill **SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale: Solly Hofman PSA 8(OC) Old Mill **SOLD**
posts.post_content: No way this card should have an OC qualifier IMO. This is one of the toughest commons to find in high grade with a common back, let alone a scarcer one. There is only 1 straight PSA 8 (common back) with none higher. A PSA 7 with common back sold for $1774 at Mile High Auctions. Asking $1150 delivered...... Price reduced to $850, fantastic card....**SOLD**
Strong price reduction, very scarce frt/back combo....
Brutal qualifier. I guess top to bottom centering, but still...
